metadata.description: Bug tracking for Local LLM MCP Server development workflow

classification.low: Minor issue, cosmetic or edge case

bugs.title: Schema validator requires ALL files exist before any can be created
bugs.description: The schema validator enforces existence of all files in the schema structure, making it impossible to incrementally build the project. This creates a chicken-and-egg problem.
bugs.workaround: Disable schema validation during development phase

bugs.title: Agent.py exceeds 300 line limit
bugs.description: src/core/agents/agent/agent.py has 331 lines, exceeding the 300 line schema limit
bugs.workaround: Split agent class into smaller components

bugs.title: Multiple missing test files and READMEs
bugs.description: Schema validation shows ~100+ missing test files and README files across the project structure
bugs.impact: Schema validation failure, incomplete test coverage
bugs.workaround: Use template generation to create skeleton files

bugs.title: ConfigManager missing validate_all method
bugs.description: Server startup fails with AttributeError: 'ConfigManager' object has no attribute 'validate_all'
bugs.impact: Server cannot start, blocking all functionality
bugs.workaround: Add validate_all method to ConfigManager or fix server startup logic

bugs.title: Missing LLAMA model file
bugs.impact: Server cannot load LLM model, no local model functionality
bugs.workaround: Mount correct model path or update configuration
